name: WheelZoomPolicy
description: draw2d.policy.canvas.WheelZoomPolicy Zoom support for a canvas. Use the mouse wheel and the shift key to zoom in/out.

constructor.name: WheelZoomPolicy

functions.name: onMouseWheel
functions.description: called if the user uses the mouse wheel.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x coordinate of the event

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y coordinate of the event

returns.description: return false to preven tthe default event operation (e.g. scrolling)

functions.name: setZoom
functions.description: Set the new zoom level of the canvas.

functions.name: onInstall
functions.description: Called if the policy is installed into the canvas.

functions.name: onUninstall
functions.description: Called if the policy is deinstalled from the canvas

functions.name: onClick
functions.description: Called by the canvas if the user click on a figure.

parameters.name: the
parameters.description: figure under the click event. Can be null

parameters.name: mouseX
parameters.description: the x coordinate of the mouse during the click event

parameters.name: mouseY
parameters.description: the y coordinate of the mouse during the click event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x-coordinate of the mouse event

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y-coordinate of the mouse event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

functions.name: onDoubleClick
functions.description: Called by the canvas if the user double click on a figure.

parameters.name: the
parameters.description: figure under the double click event. Can be null

parameters.name: mouseX
parameters.description: the x coordinate of the mouse during the click event

parameters.name: mouseY
parameters.description: the y coordinate of the mouse during the click event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

parameters.name: dx
parameters.description: The x diff between start of dragging and this event

parameters.name: dy
parameters.description: The y diff between start of dragging and this event

parameters.name: dx2
parameters.description: The x diff since the last call of this dragging operation

parameters.name: dy2
parameters.description: The y diff since the last call of this dragging operation

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

parameters.name: figure
parameters.description: the shape below the mouse or null

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

functions.name: onRightMouseDown
functions.description: Called if the user press the right mouse in the canvas.

parameters.name: figure
parameters.description: the figure below the mouse

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y-coordinate of the mouse down event

parameters.name: shiftKey
parameters.description: true if the shift key has been pressed during this event

parameters.name: ctrlKey
parameters.description: true if the ctrl key has been pressed during the event

functions.name: snap
functions.description: Adjust the coordinates to the given constraint.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.description: the related canvas

parameters.name: figure
parameters.description: the figure to snap

parameters.name: modifiedPos
parameters.description: the already modified position of the figure (e.g. from an another Policy)

parameters.name: originalPos
parameters.description: the original requested position of the figure

functions.name: createMonochromGif
functions.description:
Helper method to make an monochrome GIF image WxH pixels big, first create a properly sized array: var pixels = new Array(WH);. Then, for each pixel X,Y that should be opaque, store a 1 at the proper location: pixels[X+YW] = 1;. Finally, create the image: var my_glif = createGif(W, H, pixels, color); "0" pixels are transparent. The color defines the foreground color.

Now, you can specify this image as the SRC attribute of an IMG tag: document.write("<IMG SRC="" + my_glif + "">"); or for the canvas as background-image css attribute.

functions.name: attr
functions.description:
Read or set object attributes.
When no value is given, reads specified attribute from the element.
When value is given, sets the attribute to that value. Multiple attributes can be set by passing an object with name-value pairs.
